fields.name: The Sword of Inari
fields.description: The Sword of Inari, a powerful artifact of antiquity, has reappeared and is in the possession of an evil army in the city of Tornio. The Guild of Magicians needs a savvy adventurer to retrieve it from behind enemy lines, before the evil sorcerers can turn its magic on the rest of the world.
fields.intro_text:
Listen now and hear a great tale of ages past. Some call this story fiction, but there are many who think this story is true. Listen now and hear this tale. Maybe you can decide on your own...

Legend has it that long ago, a great evil covered all the land. The peasants cried out for divine help, to no avail. Then, one day, a mysterious man arrived to the land. His origin is not known, but he was called Nuorgam or "Northman". Nuorgam led the peasants to rebel against the dark evil. His blade, the Sword of Inari, protected his people and blessed them.

Even the smallest boy was as strong as ten men. Quickly, they drove back the evil and created a free republic. This land, the Tasavalta, created a safe and prosperous haven for its citizens.

Two centuries after the creation of Tasavalta, great evil threatened again. Nuorgam had left long ago and the Sword of Inari could not be found. The entire land of Tasavalta was obliterated.

Every person was killed. Buildings were razed, crops were destroyed, and forests were burned. Finally the earth itself was opened, and Tasavalta was no more.

This legend is over 20,000 years old.

---

Two weeks ago, the Guild of Magicians detected a magical rift appearing somewhere in the land of Eamon. Its size and strength was like nothing that has been recorded in modern times.

Days later, rumors began to surface of a faraway kingdom being attacked. The capital city, Tornio, was taken and the King was executed! Powerful magic fields were detected near Tornio during the attack.

The Guild of Magicians believe that the magic fields are from the Sword of Inari. Concerned about the return of the sword and the power that it holds, the Guild decided to recover the sword.

Three elite spies have attempted to enter the city, but the city is walled and they were unable to penetrate the defenses. However, the spies were able to ascertain the location of the sword.

It is located within the cathedral at Tornio. The Guild believes the sorcerers who brought the sword back into this world are trying to steal the magic from the sword for their own uses.

You have been hired as an experienced journeyman to recover the sword. An experienced ranger, Esher, will join you on your quest. The Guild has decided to make an attempt of entering Tornio by airship.

---

The Guild gave you some special items to help recover the sword. You receive a special scabbard which can mask the magical field of the sword. You also get a special amulet to mimic the sword's magical field.

You also receive a magical cube. It is able to create an illusion of an army of soldiers. This may prove be useful if you need to create a diversion!

Banedon, the skyraider's captain, flew you under cover of darkness to the skies over Tornio. However, storms arose quickly, damaging the ship. Banedon gave orders to fly the ship above the storm.

"I cannot land in a storm during the night. I don't want to risk illuminating the landing site. However, we can try something else. At dawn, I may be able to get close enough to the highest tower of the cathedral. We can then drop some lines and you can climb down. However, you would have to find your own way out as I cannot stay long enough to risk detection."

Facing no other choice, you and Esher agree to the plan. At dawn, Banedon pilots the ship back into the storm and hovers over the cathedral. Lines are dropped, and you make preparations for your descent...

fields.name: You are on the bridge of the skyraider.  (D)
fields.description: You are on the bridge of the airship skyraider.  The windows are a dark grey with the clouds surrounding the ship.  The crew of the airship is working hard to keep it aloft in the storm conditions outside of the craft.

fields.name: You are on the deck of the airship skyraider.  (U/D)
fields.description: You are on the deck of the skyraider.  Fierce winds indicate that a storm is approaching.  Ropes hanging over the side of the craft allow you to descend to the bell tower below.  Heavy clouds make it difficult to see anything else.

fields.name: You are on the roof of the bell tower.  (N/S/E/W/U/D)
fields.description: You find yourself high on the roof of the tower.  In the storm, the skyship has left leaving you without an escape.  A wooden hatch is set into the floor of the tower.  Any other direction could be quite dangerous.

fields.name: You are on a landing of the bell tower.  (U/D)
fields.description: You find yourself at a landing in the bell tower.  Light pours in from the open hatch above and provides the only light in this otherwise dark room.  A huge bell makes movement difficult.  Ladders lead upward and downward.

fields.name: You are on a larger landing.  (E/U/D)
fields.description: Reaching a similar landing, you notice a wooden door on the east wall.  Light from the room beyond outlines the door and provides the only light in the room.  A ladder climbs upward and a spiral staircase starts its decent here.

fields.name: You are in a wizard's study.  (W)
fields.description: You have entered a wizard's study.  The walls are lined with a virtual library of books.  A simple table provides the only furnishings.  The storm continues to rage outside an open window.  The exit is back to the west.

fields.name: You are at the bottom of a staircase.  (N/W/U)
fields.description: At the bottom of the stairs, you begin to hear loud chanting sounds in the next room to the west.  A smaller room is set to the north.  The chanting sounds seem to be coming from a rather large group of people.

fields.name: You are in a small room near the nave.  (S)
fields.description: You have entered a small room near the nave of the cathedral.  A rope here leads upward through a tiny hole in the roof.  A small peephole allows you to look in on the nave itself.  The exit is back to the south.

fields.name: You are in the nave of a cathedral.  (N/S/E)
fields.description: The huge nave of the Tornio Cathedral is incredibly immense.  Rows of pews line the giant room.  An grand altar fills the north of the cathedral.  The narthex is visible through a south gateway.  You can also return to the east.

fields.name: You are at the grand altar.  (S/U)
fields.description: A grand altar fills this side of the cathedral.  The Sword of Inari hangs high over the altar, held by a giant brace.  The giant chamber continues to echo the sounds of the missing worshippers.  You can return to the nave by going south.

fields.name: You are on the altar.  (D)
fields.description: You are standing atop the altar.  A giant brace is mounted onto the wall, holding the Sword of Inari.  The residual echoes have finally subsided.  You can return to the floor by going down.

fields.name: You are in the narthex.  (N/S)
fields.description: You have entered the narthex, the main entrance portal to the church.  There is nothing visible in the room, other than the exit to the street on the south and the entrance to the nave at the north.  Outside, the storm continues.

fields.name: You find yourself on an east/west street.  (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: The giant cathedral looms to your north.  A doorway lies to the south.  As rain pours down from the sky, water streams down the street eastward.

fields.name: You are on an east/west street.  (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: To the south, noise drifts out from a small, dark tavern. A leatherworker's shop lies to the north. Rain continues to fall, streaming down the street towards the east.

fields.name: You are in the Dark Horse Tavern.  (N/E)
fields.description: You have entered a smoke filled tavern.  The occupants don't seem concerned about your entrance and return to drinking.  A door to the east leads to an adjacent inn.  The bar is amply stocked with beers and other intoxicants.  An exit is north.

fields.name: You are in the Dark Horse Inn.  (N/S/W)
fields.description: Entering the Dark Horse Inn, you notice the place is almost empty.  Rain pounds on the door and on the tin roof above.  A small corridor goes southwards.  Doors lead north to the street and back west.  A sign hangs over the counter.

fields.name: You are on an east/west street near the inn.
fields.description: You are back on an east/west street. An inn is to the south. The back side of a building blocks passage to the north. Rain flows into an iron sewer grate in the middle of the street.

fields.name: You are in the middle of a short hall.  (N/S/E/W)
fields.description: You are standing outside two doors east and west.  The east door is made of oak whereas the west door is hickory.  Light is coming in from a window at the end of the hallway south.

fields.name: You are in a small hotel room.  (E/W)
fields.description: You are in a cheap room. A straw mattress lies on a rickety wooden bed in the corner. Next to the mattress is a table and chair. A lantern hangs from the ceiling. Through the window to the east, you can see the wall of some unknown building. A door leads west.

fields.name: You are on a window sill.  (W/D)
fields.description: Facing you is the side of a small building.  It's only about five feet off the ground, so you could surely survive a jump if that was what you wanted to do.  Otherwise, you can reenter the window by going west.

fields.name: You are in a north/south alley.
fields.description: You are in a narrow alleyway. You can see the main street to the north and a different street to the south.  A small crack, barely wide enough to walk down, goes between two buildings on your east. Rainwater flows towards an iron sewer grate in the ground. To the west is the outer wall of the inn, which contains an open window that you could climb through.

fields.name: You are on an east/west street with alley north.  (N/E/W)
fields.description: You see a different east/west street.  Rain continues to pour down here.  To the east and west you see armed soldiers.  The south presents the backside of some unknown building.  Alternatively, you can return north.

fields.name: You are in between two buildings.  (N/S/W)
fields.description: You are smack in the middle of two dark buildings.  You are unable to continue to the east as it becomes too narrow.  A door into one of the buildings is ajar.  Otherwise, your only exit is west.

fields.name: You are under a storm drain.  (E/U)
fields.description: Soaking, you pull the iron grate closed behind you.  Rain continues to pour down and threatens to extinguish your light.  The water flows east towards the ocean.  Back to the west, the tunnel is too narrow to explore.

fields.name: You are at the exit of the sewer drain.  (U)
fields.description: After several miles, you reach the exit of the sewer.  You see Captain Banedon waving from the skyraider flying overhead, waiting to return you to safety.

fields.name: You are at the south end of a hallway.  (N/E/W)
fields.description: There are rooms to the east and west of you and a small window to the south.  The window cannot be opened.

fields.name: You are in a small room.  (W)
fields.description: You are in a small cell room.  There is very little light here as there is no window.  The room smells foul and musty as if it has not been used in quite some time.

fields.name: You are in a small closet.  (E)
fields.description: You are in a small dark storage closet.  There is very little of interest in here other than the fascinating smell that you have just discovered!

fields.name: You are in a small room.  (E)
fields.description: You are in a small room of the inn.  This room is in shambles and it looks like there has been a struggle or fight here recently.  There is little to see other than the exit east.

fields.name: You are on an east/west street.  (S/E/W/D)
fields.description: As you walk down the street, you notice a sign hanging over the door to a blacksmith's shop to the south.  The wall of the cathedral is blocking your way north.  Rain pours into a iron sewer grate here.

fields.name: You are in the blacksmith's building.  (N)
fields.description: You enter a hot room with a small fire burning in a nearby furnace.  A hammer and a set of tongs lie on an anvil.  Iron tools hang from hooks on the ceiling.  Armor parts hang on the wall and a scrap of paper lies on the ground.

fields.name: You are in the leatherworker's building.  (S)
fields.description: As you enter the building, you are overwhelmed by the smell of fresh leather.  Leather goods of all types from shoes to armor are displayed on the walls here.  The exit to the street is south.

fields.name: You are in the wheelwright's building.  (N)
fields.description: The wheelwright specializes in making wheels (what else?) for both wagons and cannons alike.  Thus the room is strewed with various piles of wood and, of course, wheels of every size.  The only exit is north.

fields.name: You are on an east/west street.  (S/E/W/D)
fields.description: The street continues east and west here.  To the north is the cathedral wall.  On the south side of the street is a small stable.  The rain continues to come down in torrents, pouring into a small iron sewer grate in the middle of the street.

fields.name: You are in a small stable.  (N)
fields.description: Several stalls stand open and empty.  Apparently, when the bell rang, soldiers were sent out on horseback as there are several sets of shod horsetracks in the mud here.  The only exit is to the north.

fields.name: You are under a storm drain.  (U)
fields.description: You've managed to squeeze down into the storm drain.  Movement is very tight and difficult.  Some light comes through the iron grate.  The rain water flows to the east, but you can't follow as the tunnel is much too small.

fields.name: helsingin bow
fields.description: A finely made helsingin bow clatters as it hits the ground.  The ebony finish is of magnificent quality.  This type of bow is well-known for its destructive power due to its special compound design.

fields.name: mace
fields.description: The sentry's weapon is an ordinary mace. Although not very powerful, this weapon is sure to be useful if another weapon breaks.

fields.name: magic staff
fields.description: A magical staff lays on the ground where it was dropped by the wizard.  Surely it contains magical powers, but your skill and training is not that of a mage and its magical powers are useless to you.  It can be used as a weapon though.

fields.name: iron key
fields.description: As the sentry falls, a small iron key clangs loudly on the ground.

fields.name: wooden hatch
fields.description: A wooden hatch covers the entrance to the tower.  The hatch is closed to stop water from pouring down into the tower.

fields.name: iron bell
fields.description: A large iron bell fills the room.  Surely it would be impossible to move it.  It probably took quite a feat just to raise it up this high.

fields.name: wooden door
fields.description: A small wooden door prevents movement to the room beyond it.

fields.name: peephole
fields.description: Looking through the peephole, you have a good view of the nave of the cathedral. A multitude of worshippers are chanting loudly to their leader, who you cannot see from this vantage point. There must be several hundred of them!

fields.name: bell rope
fields.description: You see a bell rope dangling down from the ceiling.

fields.name: altar
fields.description: A grand wooden structure serves as the altar of this cathedral.  Finished with a heavy oak, it would surely be too heavy to move.  It looks sturdy enough for you to stand on.

fields.name: amulet
fields.description: You see a small emerald amulet that will serve as a beacon when it replaces the Sword of Inari.  Its magical properties mask the swords absence by "transmitting" a magic fingerprint of its own which copies the fingerprint of the sword.

fields.name: Sword of Inari
fields.description: Before you is the mystic Sword of Inari, the goal of your quest.  Unfortunately, its magical aura is quite strong.  If the sword is detected, you could be easily tracked down.  You must somehow mask the sword's magic.

fields.name: scabbard
fields.description: You see a scabbard designed to hold the Sword of Inari to prevent its magical signature from leading an enemy to you.

fields.name: silver cube
fields.description: You see a small silver cube that has the magic to create an illusionary army for a short time.  The magic requires a large area to work correctly, and cannot be used more than once.

fields.name: table
fields.description: A small wooden table sits in the corner.

fields.name: chair
fields.description: A small wooden chair is sitting beside the table.

fields.name: oak door
fields.description: A large oak door blocks entrance in to the room to the east.

fields.name: window
fields.description: A window is set into the eastern wall of the room.

fields.name: brass key
fields.description: You see a small brass key.

fields.name: lantern
fields.description: A small old lantern is hanging from the rafters of the room.  It is not lit.  It will probably provide a good deal of light if the situation warrants.

fields.name: mattress
fields.description: An old straw-stuffed mattress lies on a rickety bed. It doesn't look very comfortable.

fields.name: bottle
fields.description: On the table is a small bottle.  Writing on the bottle says, "Compliments of The Dark Horse Inn".

fields.name: iron sewer grate
fields.description: An iron storm grate covers a hole in the ground.  Rainwater cascades into it; the sound of the water hitting the sewer below is impressive.

fields.name: plans
fields.description: You see the set of plans the wizard was looking over lying here.

fields.name: note
fields.description: You see a note embossed with the seal of the Royal Guard.

fields.name: rope
fields.description: A rope is hanging over the side of the skyraider.  It is attached to the skyship and cannot be removed.

fields.name: table
fields.description: You see a small wooden table sitting in the middle of the room.  On the table you find a set of plans.  Also on the table is a note embossed with a royal seal.

fields.name: window
fields.description: Through the window, you see the swirling of clouds.  The window is locked and can not be opened.  You're too high up to go out the window anyway.

fields.name: peephole
fields.description: Looking through the peephole, you find that the nave is completely empty.  All of the worshippers have left to respond to the ringing of the bell.

fields.name: brace
fields.description: The Sword of Inari is held in place by a rather large brace.  It may be possible to remove the sword from the brace, but it would take considerable effort.

fields.name: beer
fields.description: You see a fresh beer here, straight from the keg.

fields.name: placard
fields.description: A small brass placard hangs on the door of the tavern. It reads, "Dark Horse Tavern."

fields.name: sign
fields.description: A sign hangs over the counter: "Rooms 10 gold pieces. Please pay innkeeper in advance."

fields.name: sign
fields.description: A sign hangs over the door to the south. It has a picture of a candle on it and the words, "Dark Horse Inn."

fields.name: hickory door
fields.description: A large hickory door blocks entrance in to the room to the west.

fields.name: nothing but sure can smell it
fields.description: You can't see a smell of course.  Maybe you're curious what it smells like?  Well let's keep this rated PG.  It just smells bad.  Really bad.  Don't even ask how bad it smells, because you're about to pass out from the smell.

fields.name: hammer
fields.description: You see a large hammer used for shaping iron tools.

fields.name: tongs
fields.description: You see a set of tongs used to extract very hot objects from fire.  The leather grips on the handles appear to be well worn.

fields.name: wheel
fields.description: You see a well-built wagon wheel laying on the ground.

fields.name: sign
fields.description: You see a sign hanging over the south doorway to a wheelwright shop. It reads, "Tayson's Wheelwright and Repair"

fields.name: sign
fields.description: As you walk down the street, you notice a sign hanging over the door to a blacksmith's shop to the south. It reads "The Hammer & Tongs"

fields.name: sign
fields.description: a sign hangs over the leatherworker's shop to the north. It reads, "Boylan's Leather Goods."

fields.name: leather armor
fields.description: You see a set of well-crafted leather armor. It appears to be a high quality leather and looks very comfortable. It has some odd shaped iron hooks as if it needed to be attached to something.

fields.name: anvil
fields.description: A very large anvil sits here, silently waiting for its master to reappear.

fields.name: wood pile
fields.description: A large pile of various wood types sits in the corner.  The wood is mainly white oak and hickory, but there is also some wood from gum trees.  The wood appears to be well seasoned and ready for use.

fields.name: iron tools
fields.description: Some high quality iron tools are lying here.

fields.name: iron sewer grate
fields.description: An iron storm grate covers a hole in the ground.  Rainwater cascades into it; the sound of water hitting the sewer below is impressive.  You may be able to pull the grate open if you try.

fields.name: iron sewer grate
fields.description: An iron storm grate covers a hole in the ground.  Rainwater cascades into it; the sound of water hitting the sewer below is impressive.  You may be able to pull the grate open if you try.

fields.name: iron sewer grate
fields.description: An iron storm grate covers a hole in the ground.  Rainwater cascades into it; the sound of water hitting the sewer below is impressive.  You may be able to pull the grate open if you try.

fields.name: reinforced plate armor
fields.description: You see a suit of reinforced plate mail armor. It appears to be extremely high quality and looks built to take a beating. Its strength is only matched by its light weight, allowing it to be worn by almost anyone.

fields.name: armor parts
fields.description: You see various pieces of plate armor lying about.  The armor appears unusual as it has some odd hooks on the inside that you've never seen before.  If you could figure out the hooks, you might be able to use the armor.

fields.name: receipt
fields.description: You see a small receipt for something.  Although the writing is scribbled, you may be able to make out what it says.

fields.text: ...destroying the sword will take a lot of effort.  However, in the presence of a multitude of worshippers chanting the curses of Pietari, the destruction will progress smoothly.  The spells needed are...  <The rest is in a foreign language.>

Let it be known that the Royal Guard has arranged a formal system to notify of an emergency in the city.  Upon ringing of the sacred bell, all persons are to take up arms and report to designated patrols throughout the city.
Dark Horse Tavern
Rooms 10 gold pieces.  Please pay innkeeper in advance.
Dark Horse Inn
As the bell clangs loudly, you hear the movement of a huge mass of people.  The chanting turns into battle orders as the worshippers move out in response to the call to duty.
You look over the side of the tower and decide that it is too high to attempt to climb down.  You should probably look for another exit.
Looking up, you find the skyraider has left!  Banedon must have not been able to keep it aloft safely during the storm.  You will need to find another way to escape with the sword.
Esher says, "Wait!  I see a patrol in that direction!  If we travel this way, we'll certainly be caught!"  Reluctantly you turn back to look for another means of escape.
You would be overwhelmed by guards if you attempted to go that direction!
It would be foolish to enter a building which obviously contains several people who are intent on killing you!

You invoke the magic of the silver cube.  Soon, it begins to shine bright red and grow larger.  A panel opens in the side and clouds of fog billow forth from it.  The fog stops, and a soldier steps forth from the cube.  Then another.  Soldiers continue marching out from the cube.  The room is filling with soldiers!  It isn't too long before soldiers fill every part of the giant hall.  When the last man steps from the cube, the cube collapses and disappears completely.
Killing Banedon was a stupid idea!  With no Captain to guide the airship in the storm, the crew is unable to keep her aloft.  Within minutes, the airship hits the ground.  You are killed on impact.

The seekers take you prisoner, strip you of your weapons and armor and take you back to the city to stand trial for your crimes.

You are taken before a high priest, for the attempted theft of the Sword of Inari. Your possessions and gold are declared forfeit. You are then placed in chains and extradited to the Main Hall in humiliation.
You are suddenly surrounded and captured by a group of seekers.  One explains, "It was obvious the sword was missing, as the magical aura around the altar went dark as soon as the sword vanished."

You are suddenly surrounded and captured by a group of seekers.  One seeker says, "After returning to the empty cathedral we immediately noticed that the Sword of Inari was missing.  We hastened to seal the escape routes from the city."

You are suddenly surrounded and captured by a group of seekers. One explains, "It was quite easy to track down the sword. Its magical aura shines like a torch in the darkness. You were much too slow to effect an escape."

The amulet shines brightly and becomes hot to the touch.  You quickly drop it on the ground.  Holding the sword close to the amulet, the amulet senses the magic properties of the sword and echoes them.  The spell has been cast successfully.
Esher says, "Wait! The Sword of Inari must be in this cathedral somewhere. If we don't find it, this entire mission will be a failure!"

Finally, the crew of the skyraider see you waiving frantically. They land in a nearby field to take you home.

Upon your return to the Main Hall, the Guild of Magicians recovers the Sword of Inari from your possession and work to safeguard the sword from future evils.

You are awarded 5,000 gold pieces for your service and bravery on this mission.

Leaving the sewer you spot the skyraider flying overhead. You try to signal it for your return trip home.

You know that you don't have the Sword of Inari, but you still must report your failure. With great apprehension, you make your way to the Guild Hall of the Magicians.

You are met by some elder magicians. "I sense you have failed in your mission..." says their leader. You have no choice but to answer in the affirmative.

"I was afraid that this might happen. I told the others you were not the right person for this mission, but they would not listen." You begin to protest, but he cuts you off.

"Enough! You have failed us! The sword will be broken and its secrets revealed. We are forever doomed." As he turns and walks away, he bids you a final farewell by saying, "Go back home like the worthless coward you are!"
Tayson's Wheelwright and Repair
The Hammer & Tongs
Boylan's Leather Goods

Receipt:

Boylan Leather Company

One customized of leather armor designed to attach to plate mail
The cube shimmers momentarily, but then melts in your hand!  Even though the room is large enough, it's full of people!
Use of the amulet here would be folly as the enemy could easily detect its magic properties were out of place!
You hook the leather armor to the plate armor and create something completely new!
The Sword of Inari appears to interfere with the power spell!
The amulet appears to interfere with the power spell!
A strange mist surrounds you for a brief moment, but then it disappears.
You see a flash of light followed by a rumbling thunder!
Your hair grows three feet longer!  You pull it back into a ponytail to keep it out of your face.
You hear a very loud sonic boom that echoes through the air.
You have been captured by the enemy! You are taken and executed for your crimes against them!

fields.name: Esher
fields.description: A short man dressed in ranger clothing introduces himself as Esher, a notorious gun for hire.  He is well-known for his skill with a helsingin bow.  Word is that Esher is a top-notch ranger who is quite experienced in this sort of mission.

fields.name: Banedon
fields.description: Banedon, the Captain of the skyraider, stands here directing his crew.  As the storm rages on, he is pre-occupied with attempting to keep the skyraider aloft and doesn't even notice your presence.

fields.name: Sentry
fields.description: A sentry looks up and gasps, astonished by your sudden appearance. He picks up a mace from the battlements and prepares to attack you.

fields.name: Wizard
fields.description: "Are the crowds ready?" a wizard asks, looking up from his plans.  When you fail to respond, he looks up and is shocked by your appearance.  He suddenly grabs his staff and prepares to attack you.

fields.name: Worshipper
fields.description: Hundreds of men dressed in red cassocks turn their head when you enter the room.  "Intruder!" the cry goes out.  They leap up from their pews and surge forward to rip you apart.

fields.name: Illusionary Soldier
fields.description: A multitude of lifelike soldiers stands before you.  Men of every type represent this illusionary army, fully dressed and armed.  This army will buy you some time as no one would dare enter a room with so many potential enemies.

fields.name: Drinker
fields.description: Several men are here, involved in their drinking.  They ignore your entrance and continue drinking.

fields.name: Bartender
fields.description: A bartender struggles to keep up with his customers.  He doesn't notice your entrance.  When you get his attention, he tells you that drinks cost 10 gold pieces each.  (GIVE 10 TO BARTENDER)

fields.name: Innkeeper
fields.description: As you enter, the innkeeper greets you and asks if you would like a room.

fields.name: Soldier
fields.description: You see a group of soldiers looking for anyone they don't recognize.  Seeing you, they draw their weapons and prepare to attack.

fields.name: Worshipper
fields.description: A small group of worshippers has found you.  They ready their staffs and prepare to attack.

fields.name: Tracker
fields.description: A group of trackers has found you!  A man sneers, "Too easy!  No one else would be out in this storm.  One hundred gold pieces to the man who kills him!"  All around you, the trackers raise their weapons and get ready to launch their attacks.

fields.name: Acolyte
fields.description: An acolyte looks up from his preparation to destroy the Sword or Inari.  The loss of his audience has left him alone.  He grabs a staff and prepares to attack you.

fields.name: Guard
fields.description: A patrol of guards has found you.  They draw weapons and prepare to attack.

fields.name: Maid
fields.description: A maid is trying desperately to clean up in here.  She is working quite hard and doesn't appear to notice your presence.

fields.name: Leatherworker
fields.description: You see a short stocky man smelling like tanning solution.  He is wearing a small leather jerkin and is working on a pair of boots.

fields.question: How do I get past the worshippers in the cathedral?p
How do I open the stuck grate?
The seekers keep finding me when I leave.
What do I do with the tools and the armor parts?

fields.answer: Look for clues in the wizard's room.
Ring the bell and they will leave.
Some tools might come in handy. Check the shops.
Read the intro text carefully. Also, you get 3 items at the beginning. Did you use all of them?
Climb up on the altar. Remove the Sword of Inari from the brace. Use the amulet, then put the Sword of Inari into the scabbard. Then use the cube in the nave, once all the worshippers have gone.
You can make something very powerful with those. There are two items in town with unusual-looking hooks on them. Find them both.
The receipt in the blacksmith's shop is a clue.
The hammer is not the correct tool for the job.
Give the receipt to the leatherworker and get the leather armor. Take it to the blacksmith's shop, gather up the armor parts and leather armor, and use the tools.
